titleSlide.notes: Welcome everyone. Today we'll review our Q1 performance and discuss our strategic initiatives.

slides.title: Agenda
slides.notes: This presentation will cover six main topics. We'll spend about 5 minutes on each section.

slides.title: Financial Performance
slides.notes: Revenue has shown consistent growth, with Q1 2025 reaching $5.2M, a 15% YoY increase.

slides.title: Key Achievements
slides.notes: These achievements position us well for continued growth in Q2 and beyond.

slides.title: Market Analysis
slides.notes: We're gaining share across all segments, with strongest performance in enterprise.

slides.title: Strategic Initiatives for Q2
slides.notes: These initiatives are designed to maintain our growth momentum and competitive advantage.

slides.title: Q2 Outlook
slides.content:
Based on current pipeline and market conditions, we project:

• Revenue growth of 18-20% YoY
• Margin improvement of 2-3%
• Customer acquisition cost reduction of 10%
• Product launches on track for mid-quarter

Risks include supply chain challenges and competitive pressure, which we are actively mitigating.
slides.notes: We're confident in our ability to meet these targets based on strong fundamentals.

slides.title: Thank You
slides.notes: Open floor for questions. Key team leads are here to provide additional details.
